original_title: Patti LuPone: Songs From a Hat
overview: Does anyone still wear a hat? Yes: three-time Tony Award-winner Patti LuPone. And her hat is filled with songs, both new and old. See Patti up close and unscripted as she sings and tells stories from her illustrious careerâ€”whatever she pulls from the hat. Filmed live at 54 Below on New Year's Day 2023.
title: Patti LuPone: Songs From a Hat
